info.title: Pokemon3D API
info.description: This API provides access to 3D models of Pokémon.

get.description: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all Pokémon (regular, shiny, etc.).

200.description: Successful retrieval of Regular Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Shiny variant Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Shiny Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Alolan form Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Alolan Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Hisuian form Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Hisuian Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Galar form Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Galar Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Primal form Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Primal Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Origin form Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Origin Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Mega evolved Pokémon.

200.description: Successful retrieval of Mega Pokémon data.

get.description: Retrieves data for Pokémon introduced in Pokémon X and Y.

200.description: Successful retrieval of XY Pokémon data.
Successful retrieval of Gigantamax Pokémon data.
